description: This file demonstrates how to instrument an agno agent with OpenInference and send traces to LangSmith, including setting up environment variables, importing necessary modules, configuring OpenTelemetry tracing, and creating an agent with specific tools and model.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent configured with a model and tools to perform tasks.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Represents an OpenAI chat model used by the agent.

classes.name: DuckDuckGoTools
classes.description: Provides tools for DuckDuckGo search integration.

classes.name: AgnoInstrumentor
classes.description: Handles instrumentation of the agno agent with OpenInference.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the agent's response to a given prompt.
